Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameTableObjects

Class IsleManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameTableObjects.IsleManager
public class IsleManager extends Object
IsleManager is the class responsible for managing the isles' composition on the board.

  • Constructor Details

    • IsleManager

      public IsleManager()
      Isle manager constructor.

  • Method Details

    • unifyIsle

      public void unifyIsle(int isle1, int isle2)
      Unifies two different isles. It updates the values of the first isle using the ones from the second isle, then the second isle is removed and at the end we reset all the Isle ids.
      Parameters:
      isle1 - the index of the first Isle.
      isle2 - the index of the second Isle.

    • checkUnifyIsle

      public void checkUnifyIsle(int isleID)
      Checks whether isles have to be unified or not.
      Parameters:
      isleID - is the index of the isle which we start the check on.

    • isMNMovementAcceptable

      public boolean isMNMovementAcceptable(int isleIndex, int mnMovement)
      According to the isle chosen by player and the maximum number of MN movements he can do, it checks if the movement of mother nature is possible.
      Parameters:
      isleIndex - index of the chosen isle.
      mnMovement - MN movement number that can be seen on the assistant card played.
      Returns:
      true if the movement is acceptable, else false.

    • getIsleOppositeToMotherNatureIndex

      public int getIsleOppositeToMotherNatureIndex()
      Getter method for the isle on the opposite side of the one that has mother nature on it.
      Returns:
      the index of the isle opposite to the one with mother nature.

    • getIsleWithMotherNatureIndex

      public int getIsleWithMotherNatureIndex()
      Getter method for the isle with mother nature.
      Returns:
      the index of the isle that has mother nature.

    • getIsle

      public Isle getIsle(int index)
      Getter method that gives the isle of a certain index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index associated to a certain isle in the ArrayList.
      Returns:
      the isle associated to that index.

    • getIsles

      public ArrayList<Isle> getIsles()
      Method used only for testing. Gives the list of active isles.
      Returns:
      the list of active isles.

    • setIsleWithMotherNatureIndex

      public void setIsleWithMotherNatureIndex(int newMNIsleIndex)
      Setter method for the isle where mother nature was now moved.
      Parameters:
      newMNIsleIndex - index of the isle where mother nature has been moved.
